hero.title: Diajor S.A.S
hero.subtitle: Craftsmanship & Quality
hero.description: We create unique artisanal products designed to stand out and last. Displays and more, made with passion.

products.title: Our Artisanal Products
products.description: Discover our exclusive collection of products made with dedication and quality.

modal.interested_desc: Contact us for more information and quotes

1.name: Premium Display
1.description: High-quality display designed to highlight your products. Made with resistant materials and professional finishes.

2.name: Compact Display
2.description: Perfect compact solution for small spaces. Maximizes product visibility without taking up much space.

3.name: Modular Display
3.description: Modular system that adapts to your needs. Configure the space according to your products and preferences.

4.name: Wall Display
4.description: Take advantage of vertical space with this wall display. Ideal for stores and commercial spaces.

5.name: Rotating Display
5.description: Rotating display that allows viewing all products from any angle. Perfect for points of sale.

6.name: Counter Display
6.description: Specifically designed for counters. Keeps your products organized and accessible.

7.name: Luxury Display
7.description: Luxury display with premium finishes. Ideal for high-end products and exclusive boutiques.

8.name: Industrial Display
8.description: Robust industrial-style display. Combines functionality with modern aesthetics.

9.name: Minimalist Display
9.description: Minimalist design that highlights your products. Perfect for modern and clean environments.

10.name: Multifunctional Display
10.description: Multifunctional solution that adapts to different types of products. Maximum versatility.

11.name: Custom Display
11.description: We design the perfect display for your business. Fully customizable according to your needs.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At Diajor S.A.S, we are dedicated to offering innovative artisanal solutions. Our team works tirelessly to provide you with high-quality products.
about.mission_desc: To provide artisanal products that help businesses stand out, offering quality and exceptional service.
about.vision_desc: To be leaders in the artisanal product market, recognized for our innovation and quality.
about.team_desc: Meet the people behind our artisanal quality.

contact.title: Have a Project in Mind?
contact.description: We are ready to help you. Send us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.info_desc: Fill out the form or contact us directly.
